content.text: To redesign the online shop Rimeks.
The created design is clean and friendly.
The project was handed in to the developer, in process

The former front page was overwhelmed because of different banners and inconsistent icons. Thus, a new type of banners and special offer publications was designed by me, so that it could be maintained without designer’s help. The icons were switched to mini pictures.

Any product can be bought, purchased by installments, or it can have a special price. These elements were arranged hierarchically. Now the customer is not easily distracted by the number of colorful elements.
The catalogue was redrafted using different sizes of elements to add some diversity. After introducing the mini pictures, the catalogue came back to life.
I redesigned all the pages and the mobile version of the website.
